description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato & Sausage Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sweet Potato & Sausage Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add meatballs to rice mixture with reserved stock. Cook for a further 5 minutes or until meatballs are heated through. Remove from heat. Stir in sweet potato, butter (if using) and most of the parmesan until combined. Serve risotto topped with remaining parmesan and thyme.
